alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 08 at 4:52PM MST until February 08 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN NATRONA COUNTY... At 448 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located over Bar Nunn, or 7 miles north of Casper, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Casper north to Twenty Mile Hill, along Interstate 25 between mile markers 192 and 210, will see the heaviest snow. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 224. Locations impacted include... Casper, Mills, Evansville, Bar Nunn, Red Butte, Homa Hills, Antelope Hills. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED
